                  PIN_GetPointer PROC
;;;56      **********************************************************************/
;;;57     static uint32_t * PIN_GetPointer(uint8_t portnum, uint8_t pinnum)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;58     {
000002  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;59     	uint32_t *pPIN = NULL;
000004  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;60     	pPIN = (uint32_t *)(LPC_IOCON_BASE + ((portnum * 32 + pinnum)*sizeof(uint32_t)));
000006  eb011342          ADD      r3,r1,r2,LSL #5
00000a  4c0c              LDR      r4,|L1.60|
00000c  eb040083          ADD      r0,r4,r3,LSL #2
;;;61     	return pPIN;
;;;62     }
000010  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;63     
                          ENDP

                  PINSEL_ConfigPin PROC
;;;80      **********************************************************************/
;;;81     void PINSEL_ConfigPin ( uint8_t portnum, uint8_t pinnum, uint8_t funcnum)

;;;82     {

000018  460f              MOV      r7,r1
00001a  4615              MOV      r5,r2
;;;83     	uint32_t *pPIN = NULL;
00001c  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
;;;84     	pPIN = PIN_GetPointer(portnum, pinnum);
00001e  4639              MOV      r1,r7
000020  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000022  f7fffffe          BL       PIN_GetPointer

;;;85     	*pPIN &= 0x00000000;//Clear function bits

00002a  6020              STR      r0,[r4,#0]
;;;86     	*pPIN |= funcnum|(1<<5);

;;;87     }

;;;88

;;;100     **********************************************************************/
;;;101    void PINSEL_SetPinMode ( uint8_t portnum, uint8_t pinnum, PinSel_BasicMode modenum)
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;102    {
000004  4605              MOV      r5,r0
000006  460c              MOV      r4,r1
000008  4617              MOV      r7,r2
;;;103    	uint32_t *pPIN = NULL;
00000a  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
;;;104    	pPIN = PIN_GetPointer(portnum, pinnum);
00000c  46b0              MOV      r8,r6
00000e  b90d              CBNZ     r5,|L8.20|
000010  2c0c              CMP      r4,#0xc
000012  d01b              BEQ      |L8.76|
                  |L8.20|
000014  b91d              CBNZ     r5,|L8.30|
;;;105    	*(uint32_t *)pPIN &= ~(3<<3);//Clear function bits
000016  2c0d              CMP      r4,#0xd
000018  d101              BNE      |L8.30|
00001a  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00001c  e000              B        |L8.32|
                  |L8.30|
;;;106    	*(uint32_t *)pPIN |= modenum;
00001e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
                  |L8.32|
000020  b92d              CBNZ     r5,|L8.46|
000022  2c1a              CMP      r4,#0x1a
;;;107    }
000024  dc03              BGT      |L8.46|
000026  2c17              CMP      r4,#0x17
000028  db01              BLT      |L8.46|
00002a  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
00002c  e000              B        |L8.48|
                  |L8.46|
00002e  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
                  |L8.48|
000030  4308              ORRS     r0,r0,r1
000032  2d01              CMP      r5,#1
000034  d103              BNE      |L8.62|
000036  2c1e              CMP      r4,#0x1e
000038  d101              BNE      |L8.62|
00003a  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
00003c  e000              B        |L8.64|
                  |L8.62|
00003e  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
                  |L8.64|
000040  4308              ORRS     r0,r0,r1
000042  b918              CBNZ     r0,|L8.76|
000044  2d01              CMP      r5,#1
000046  d103              BNE      |L8.80|
000048  2c1f              CMP      r4,#0x1f
00004a  d101              BNE      |L8.80|
                  |L8.76|
00004c  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00004e  e000              B        |L8.82|
                  |L8.80|
000050  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
                  |L8.82|
000052  4680              MOV      r8,r0
000054  f1b80f00          CMP      r8,#0
000058  d101              BNE      |L8.94|
                  |L8.90|
00005a  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
                  |L8.94|
